# 归位（Homing）— 简化TCP协议（仅速度帧）

## 正常归位序列（减速 → 全停 → 维持 0，进入禁止=0）
### N01
```
2A E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 3B
```
### N02
```
2A BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 3B
```
### N03
```
2A 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 3B
```
### N04
```
2A C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 C8 00 00 00 3B
```
### N05
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
```
### N06
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
```
### N07
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
```
### N08
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
```

## 归位（带反转清线）序列
### R01
```
2A E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 E8 03 00 00 3B
```
### R02
```
2A BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 BC 02 00 00 3B
```
### R03
```
2A 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 90 01 00 00 3B

```
### R05
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
```
### R06
```
2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FF 3B
```

2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 3B
